seo.title: Przewodnik po Neapolu dla podróżnych na Amalfi
seo.description: Kluczowe atrakcje Neapolu, bezpieczeństwo, jedzenie i wskazówki dotyczące transportu na wybrzeże.

linkLabel: Przewodnik po Neapolu dla podróżnych na Amalfi
intro: Naples is the gateway to the Amalfi Coast. Spend a day or two exploring historic streets, pizza institutions, and easy side trips.

sections.title: Essential neighbourhoods
body: Walk Spaccanapoli for churches, nativity workshops, and the underground tours beneath San Lorenzo.

sections.title: Food & coffee
body: Queue for pizza at Sorbillo or Da Michele (expect 30–45 minutes). Grab sfogliatella and espresso at Gran Caffè Gambrinus.

tips: Carry contactless cards for metro rides and buy a day pass (€5.60) if you plan multiple hops.
Keep valuables in front pockets and use cross-body bags in crowded alleys.

faqs.q: Is Naples safe to explore on foot?
